name: Goliath, ACTIVATED!
description:
I have no idea where I was going with this so I'm just going to release it. Let me know if and how you break it!

Mute Music with M

Mute SFX with N

Move Left with D

Move Right with A

Move Up with W

Move Down with S

Fire Left Weapon with J

Fire Right Weapon with K

Fire Main cannon (when charged) with Spacebar.
